text: Namɨlaŋ 13.13 Mt 10.22, Jo 15.21 iadɨ ibi hɨvɨ salaku vibalɨlaŋ saja kulaŋ iamɨgali sɨkasɨkan agɨlaŋ nalusaŋ igɨvɨ igɨbalɨhavi uamalɨ. Kulaŋ iamɨgali hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ daŋ hɨnihɨniŋ vɨkɨlɨ mu mu agɨladɨ havuhavuŋ hɨne hɨmɨbalɨhavi uamalɨ. Hɨmavɨci Asɨ agaŋ nulɨdɨ akɨliakudaci ukaci haman laci haman laci hɨnibalɨhavi uamalɨ.
